title: Redesigning Authentic Mathematics Assessment in the AI Era: Collaborative Learning Design for Pre-Service Teachers

context.prior_knowledge: Completion of advanced courses and extensive practical experience in specialized fields
context.additional_context: Exploring how pre-service teachers can integrate AI tools into math lesson design and assessment, utilizing VR simulations in a BYOD environment to experience real classroom scenarios

learning_goals: Learners can critically analyze AI-generated math problem-solving processes and propose improvement strategies.
Learners can apply digital literacy and ethical judgment criteria when designing math assessment tasks using AI tools.
Learners can demonstrate AI-assisted evaluation processes in VR simulation environments and derive improvement strategies through peer feedback.
difficulty: Hard - Complex requirements with multiple constraints
